HIV Testing and Counseling Services are available at the NYU Student Health Center at no cost to all NYU students regardless of insurance. Individuals can gather educational materials, undergo confidential testing, and speak with a healthcare professional regarding any HIV-related issue in a safe, non-judgmental environment. Knowing your HIV status is the first step in getting information and taking action to stay healthy.     Knowing your HIV status is the first step in getting information and taking action to stay healthy.   Our dedicated HIV Counselor is available for HIV testing, providing educational materials, and/or answering questions regarding HIV-related issues. To schedule an appointment, call Primary Care at (212) 443-1122 or make an appointment online.   Testing for HIV and STIs (sexually transmitted infections) can also be performed during a routine visit with Primary Care and Women’s Health . Manhattan       Central Harlem  2238 Fifth Ave. (137th St.)  New York, NY 10037  Travel: #2 train to 135th St. Map         Tue-Sat , 8:30am-3:30pm  Services: STD Services, Emergency Contraception, HIV Counseling, Rapid Testing   Intake closes at 12:00PM every third Friday of each month for a mandatory staff meeting.         Chelsea  303 Ninth Ave. (28th St.)  New York, NY 10001  Travel: C or E trains to 23rd St. or #1 to 28th St. Map         Tue-Sat , 8:30am-3:00pm  Services: STD Services, Emergency Contraception, HIV Counseling, Rapid Testing   Tue-Thu , 5pm-7pm  Services: HIV Counseling and Testing Only   Intake closes at 12:00PM every first Wednesday of each month for a mandatory staff meeting.         Manhattanville Renaissance  21 Old Broadway (corner of 126th St.)  NY, NY 10027  (until renovations are complete at the Riverside STD clinic)  Travel: 1 train to 125th St. stop. Map         Mon-Fri , 8:30am-3:30pm  Services: STD Services, Emergency Contraception, HIV Counseling, Rapid Testing   As of Thursday, July 18, 2013, Intake closes at 12:00PM every third Thursday of each month for a mandatory staff meeting.         Staten Island     Richmond    Richmond STD Clinic located on Staten Island will be closing for patient intake as of June 1, 2013. All patients seeking service should be referred to the HHC’s Stapleton Family Health Center . The Stapleton Health Center is located at 111 Canal St. Staten Island, NY 10301. See the HHC Stapleton Center MAP .      Bronx     Morrisania  1309 Fulton Ave (E 169th St. off 3rd)  Bronx, NY 10456  Travel: 2 or 5 trains to 149th and 3rd and #15 or #55 bus to 169th and 3rd Map         Mon-Fri , 8:30am-3:00pm  Services: STD Services, Emergency Contraception, HIV Counseling, Rapid Testing   Intake closes at 12:00PM every second Friday of each month for a mandatory staff meeting.        For information about Bronx HIV testing sites that are not Health Department Clinics, see Bronx-Wide HIV Testing Initiative .      Brooklyn       Crown Heights  1218 Prospect Place (at Troy Ave.) 2nd Flr.  Brooklyn, NY 11213  Travel: By bus take the B65 heading to Ocean Hill-Brownsville; get off at Dean St & Troy Ave. From downtown Bklyn take the B51 at Smith St.; then transfer at the B65  By train station to 1218 Prospect Pl at Troy take the 4 train. Get off at Utica Ave.; walk 10 minutes or take the bus. Map         Mon-Fri , 8:30am-3:30pm  Services: STD Services, Emergency Contraception, HIV Counseling, Rapid Testing   Intake closes at 12:00PM every last Wednesday of each month for a mandatory staff meeting.           Fort Greene  295 Flatbush Ave. Extension, 2nd Flr.  (corner of Willoughby St.; near Fulton Mall & Long Island U.)  Brooklyn, NY 11201  Travel:#2, #3, #5 trains to Nevins Ave.; N, R, D trains to Dekalb Ave. Map         Tue-Sat , 8:30am-3:00pm  Services: STD Services, Emergency Contraception, HIV Counseling, Rapid Testing   Intake closes at 12:00PM every last Friday of each month for a mandatory staff meeting.         Queens       Corona  34-33 Junction Blvd. (Roosevelt/Northern)  Jackson Heights, NY 11372  Travel: #7 train to Junction Blvd.; #72 bus to 35th Ave. Map         Tue-Fri , 8:30am-3:00pm  Services: STD Services, Emergency Contraception, HIV Counseling, Rapid Testing          Jamaica  90-37 Parsons Blvd. 1st Flr. (off Jamaica Ave.)  Jamaica, NY 11432  Travel: E, Z, J train to Parsons Blvd. Map         Tue-Sat , 8:30am-3:00pm  Services: STD Services, Emergency Contraception, HIV Counseling, Rapid Testing   Intake closes at 12:00PM every last Thursday of each month for a mandatory staff meeting.
